item.title: Setup
item.description: Before we can start editing an EPUB, we need to download a few tools. Follow the links below to get started: Sigil Sigil is an open source, multi-platform EPUB ebook editor. We’ll use Sigil to edit EPUBs. ePub3-itizer ePub3-itizer is a plug-in for Sigil that will convert an EPUB 2 into a EPUB 3. If you’re using a Mac, you’ll also need to download ActiveTcl for this plugin to work.

item.title: Resources
item.description: It’s not required that you read or understand all about EPUB, HTML, et cetera. However, the below resources are a good place to start if you want to know more about the how’s and why’s of ebook creation and accessibility. Webpages EPUB Specifications and Projects: A great list of EPUB resources Accessible Publishing Knowledge Base: The bible of accessible publishing CSS Tutorial Videos Free courses
